reviews.review: Ok movie. A lot of the players in this movie were done out of character. Over all, all of Thors fight scenes and general banter were funny. Gremora was well done for most of the movie. Loved Thonas, but thought his reasoning for killing half the universe was unbelievably dumb. Population control...thats it. As if in 10 years the population wouldnt just double up again. (As it has repeatedly on earth in recent decades). They got everything wrong about the Hulk that you could possible mess up. The hulk was scared the entire movie of dudes that Ironman in his normal suit could wipe the floor with...??? I just dont understand the thought process on that decision. And the actor could not get half his lines out without laughing, as if he just didnt care. Dr. Strange was great in the fight scenes, but just dumb when it came to the lines they gave him and his decisions. Handing over the time stone... just wrong for the character from every point of view. The Guardians of the Galaxy where just portrayed as complete idiot with absolutely no control over any of their actions or emotions. Spidy was ok, but some of his joke were flat, others were funny. Capt America, Blavk Widow, and Bucky were great, but little scene time. I feel if they had gotten more time they would have messed them up too. Black Panther was there too, had no point other than Wakonda. The Wakonda fight was a joke,  the city force shield can stop obital bombardments all day apparently, but scratches from a bunch of oversized sand flees can get you right through. I could go on and on about how earth's smartest heros must have been smoking crack or something before the fights, but all in all it was ok. Very pretty backgrounds and cgi was good.
A fantastic union of the Marvel Cinematic Universe thus far, and a great prologue to the final act.

Infinity War sucede no que promete. É grande, é promissor e consegue dar uma certa maturidade ao estúdio que nunca fora vista.
Mesmo que os irmãos Russo consigam transparecer muito do que acontece em cada núcleo, no final das contas o filme de Thanos acaba sendo genérico onde não deveria ser.
Se não fosse pelo seu vilão multidimensional e a atuação absurda de Josh Brolin, Infinity War seria só mais um.
Os "spoilers" não existem, mas o marketing funcionou bem e esta parte inacabada, definitivamente é um excelente gancho para uma nova entrada sublime na franquia.
É esperar para ver a obra, finalmente completa.

This movie is more than i expected it to be. Everything in this movie is not what i have seen in any superhero film. I did cry two times during watching this, very emotional one and very entertaining. I hope Avengers 4 will complete this amazing journey of Marvel.

they take their time to explain the point of Thanos backstory in a limited time pretty nicely, although it would be better to enhance Thanos backstory alongside gamora appearance before in guardian of the galaxy's, like giving flashback and greater familial bonds.

the worst part of this film is jumbled around because of too many heroes that make the action can only be enjoyed momentarily, resulting in a confusing action with no artistic value into the action.

Better than I had hoped, was not sure if they would do Thanos justice but they did. Best Superhero villain to date in either franchise. The next one can't come soon enough. Please fire Kathleen Kennedy and let these guys take over Star Wars for Disney before it's too late.
Just a really great film,it met my expectations by bringing humor in the constant new meetings of mcu heroes. By bringing action along with pain. It was amazing.

The Russo brother's made a Marvel masterpiece! Anger, humour, empathy, sorrow, disbelief, and for some maybe even a tear or two, that is the emotionally exhausting ride that this movie will take you on as a fan of the Marvel Cinematic Universe and these characters. If you're expecting Shakespeare in Love, please take your stick(the one stuck up your...) and move along and allow people to enjoy this movie for what it is, a sci-fi ADVENTURE with heart from start to finish.

Mi critica es que es la mejor película de marvel y de superheroes hecha hasta la fecha ya que en esta se encuentran una cantidad muy buena de superheroes y cada superheroe posee su película asi que en esta película en ningún momento tuvieron que dar un trasfondo de donde provenian etc, la película se centro en nuestro antagonista thanos con esto tomando a uno de los villanos de los vengadores y sin miedo en el filme matar a algunos de estos héroes, no soy ningún fantatico pero la película es muy buena, se desarrollo de manera correcta, los momentos de chistes no eran fastidiosos hadta que en cierto momento tomaron la seriedad de que estaba pasando y sobretodo una calidad de actuación de actores de renombre como Chris evans o Mark rufalo entre otros,  esta película de 2 horas 40 minutos esta fielmente adaptada al cómic, he leído algunos comentarios de que "es la peor película de superheroes" etc... Y ellos mismos fueron los que nombraron la Liga de la justicia como la mejor película (haters de marvel) para todos aquellos que vieron las 18 peliculas saben de que esta es la mejor película y en verdad no tiene ninguna queja (únicamente la orden oscura)  pero de ahi en mas no tiene nada malo. 
Película 100%,  recomendable para todos aquellos que hayan visto todas las peliculas del MCU.
